nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi we are so sorry to hear Person1 isnt feeling well. I have passed this message along to Dr  Person2. Unfortunately  we do not have control over visitor restrictions in the hospital. I would suggest calling the floor to see what their policy is and if/when you can go visit. We will keep an eye on his chart, let us know if you need  anything at all. Take care.
